In the beginning: Honour thy father
In the beginning God created the heaven: Honour thy father and thy mother: that thy days may be long upon the land which the Lord thy God giveth thee.

In the beginning: This is the day which the Lord hath made
In the beginning God created the heaven: This is the day which the Lord hath made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.

In the beginning: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet
In the beginning God created the heaven: Thy word is a lamp unto my feet, and a light unto my path.

In the beginning: Trust in the LORD with all thine heart
In the beginning God created the heaven: Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.

In the beginning: A soft answer turneth away wrath
In the beginning God created the heaven: A soft answer turneth away wrath: but grievous words stir up anger.

In the beginning: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given
In the beginning God created the heaven: For unto us a child is born, unto us a son is given: and the government shall be upon his shoulder: and his name shall be called Wonderful, Counsellor, The mighty God, The everlasting Father, The Prince of Peace.

In the beginning: The grass withereth
In the beginning God created the heaven: The grass withereth, the flower fadeth: but the word of our God shall stand for ever.

In the beginning: The LORD is Good
In the beginning God created the heaven: The LORD is good, a strong hold in the day of trouble; and he knoweth them that trust in him

In the beginning: Then saith Jesus unto him, Get thee hence, Satan: for it is written
In the beginning God created the heaven: Then saith Jesus unto him, Get thee hence, Satan: for it is written, Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God, and him only shalt thou serve.

In the beginning: Let your light so shine
In the beginning God created the heaven: Let your light so shine before men, that they may see your good works, and glorify your Father which is in heaven.

In the beginning: Judge not, and ye shall not be judged
In the beginning God created the heaven: Judge not, and ye shall not be judged: condemn not, and ye shall not be condemned: forgive, and ye shall be forgiven.

In the beginning: And I say unto you, Ask, and it shall be given you
In the beginning God created the heaven: And I say unto you, Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you.

In the beginning: For God so loved the world
In the beginning God created the heaven: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.

In the beginning: This is my commandment
In the beginning God created the heaven: This is my commandment, That ye love one another, as I have loved you.

In the beginning: And they said, Believe on the Lord Jesus Christ
In the beginning God created the heaven: And they said, Believe on the Lord Jesus Christ, and thou shalt be saved, and thy house.

In the beginning: And we know that all things work together for good
In the beginning God created the heaven: And we know that all things work together for good to them that love God, to them who are the called according to his purpose.

In the beginning: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God
In the beginning God created the heaven: I beseech you therefore, brethren, by the mercies of God, that ye present your bodies a living sacrifice, holy, acceptable unto God, which is your reasonable service.

In the beginning: Moreover it is required
In the beginning God created the heaven: Moreover it is required in stewards, that a man be found faithful.

In the beginning: And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted
In the beginning God created the heaven: And be ye kind one to another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, even as God for Christ’s sake hath forgiven you.

In the beginning: And whatsoever ye do
In the beginning God created the heaven: And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men.

In the beginning: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear
In the beginning God created the heaven: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.

In the beginning: All scripture is given by inspiration of God
In the beginning God created the heaven: All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness.

In the beginning: If we confess our sins
In the beginning God created the heaven: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

In the beginning: Thou art worthy, O Lord
In the beginning God created the heaven: Thou art worthy, O Lord, to receive glory and honour and power: for thou hast created all things, and for thy pleasure they are and were created.
